ResearchProjectDef.label: high-energy shield belts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build more stronger and faster recharging advance shield belts or higher-energy but slower to charge turtle shield belts for brawlers.\n\nNote that they both require uranium to build and still can't be used with ranged weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: military rifles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build strong military grade assault rifles which can pack deadly firepower such as freedom rifles and military combat rifles in the modern gunsmith's table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy sniper rifles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft powerful and hard hitting powerful anti-material rifles while having superior armor penetration capabilities from extreme long ranges.

ResearchProjectDef.label: destructive weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build triple rocket launchers and charge bombs to devastate masses of legions or hordes of enemies or against one stationary heavily armored targets, such as centipedes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced pulse-charged weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grasp the advanced pulse-charged projectile weaponry. Allowing you to build more powerful pulse-charge ranged weapons in the fabrication bench.\n\nNote some of these weapons will require uranium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sentinel weapons reverse engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to make weapons in the fabrication bench used by mechanoid sentinels allowing to build their assault charge blasters and other weapons that can be used by human hands.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pulse-charge lances
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build rail-assisted pulse rifles that have high killing power and high armor penetration allowing you to build sentinel lancer charge lances and long-ranged charge lance sniper rifles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy melee weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make heavier melee weapons such as mauls or greataxes in the smithy.\n\nThey are powerful when they hit, but misses when wielding one are very punishing.
